AboutPage.title: Who We Are
AboutPage.subtitle: Architects of Global Growth
AboutPage.who_we_are_desc: Makadem Group is not just a financial institution; we are the strategic engine behind the world's most ambitious infrastructure developments. From our headquarters to our global outposts, we convene the best minds to solve the most complex financing challenges.
AboutPage.mission_desc: To empower nations and private enterprises with the capital, expertise, and strategic foresight needed to build a sustainable, prosperous future for all.
AboutPage.vision_desc: A world where capital knows no borders, and where every viable infrastructure project finds the funding it needs to transform lives.

InvestorsPage.title: For Investors
InvestorsPage.subtitle: Secure, High-Yield Global Assets
InvestorsPage.roi_desc: Our portfolio consistently outperforms market averages through rigorous risk management and strategic asset selection.
InvestorsPage.stability_desc: Backed by government guarantees and long-term concession agreements, our investments offer unparalleled security.
InvestorsPage.global_desc: Access high-growth markets across Asia, Africa, and the Americas through a single, managed vehicle.

GovernmentsPage.title: For Governments
GovernmentsPage.subtitle: Nation-Building Partnerships
GovernmentsPage.partnership_desc: We understand that infrastructure is more than just concrete and steel; it is the backbone of national sovereignty and economic independence. We work hand-in-hand with ministries to deliver projects that leave a lasting legacy.
GovernmentsPage.ppp_desc: Our PPP models are designed to maximize efficiency while retaining public oversight, ensuring that national interests are always prioritized.
GovernmentsPage.development_desc: Our projects create thousands of jobs and stimulate local economies, providing a multiplier effect that lasts for generations.
